text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org.au/CodeSystem/observation-category
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Observation Category Codes

name: ObservationCategoryCodesAUExtended
title: Observation Category Codes - AU Extended

contact.name: HL7 Australia Patient Administration Working Group
HL7 Australia Orders and Observations Working Group

description: Observation Category Codes extended for use in an Australian context. Includes HL7 international codes plus Australian additions to create a complete set.
